data.eml:eml: A probably invasive new genus and new species of soft coral (Octocorallia: Alcyonacea: Clavulariidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ofwegen, Van (2011): A probably invasive new genus and new species of soft coral (Octocorallia: Alcyonacea: Clavulariidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 3107: 38-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279251
